metadata.description: Data engineer or ML engineer specializing in data pipelines, analytics, and machine learning

skills.name: SQL & Databases
skills.description: Complex queries, JOINs, window functions, query optimization, indexing

skills.name: Python Programming
skills.description: Python fundamentals, data structures, object-oriented programming

skills.name: Data Structures & Algorithms
skills.description: Arrays, trees, graphs, sorting, searching, algorithmic thinking

skills.name: Data Manipulation (Pandas, NumPy)
skills.description: Data cleaning, transformation, aggregation, analysis with Pandas/NumPy

skills.name: Machine Learning Basics
skills.description: Supervised/unsupervised learning, model training, evaluation metrics

skills.name: Statistical Analysis
skills.description: Hypothesis testing, probability, statistical methods, A/B testing

skills.name: Data Visualization
skills.description: Matplotlib, Seaborn, Tableau, dashboarding, storytelling with data

skills.name: Big Data Technologies
skills.description: Spark, Hadoop, distributed processing, data at scale

skills.name: ETL Pipelines
skills.description: Data extraction, transformation, loading, pipeline orchestration

skills.name: Cloud Platforms (AWS/GCP)
skills.description: Cloud data services, storage, compute, data warehousing

skills.name: System Design
skills.description: Data pipeline design, warehouse architecture, scalability

phasesStructure.focus: Get ready for your target role

companiesInsight.title: What Different Companies Expect
companiesInsight.description: Different company types have different interview processes and value propositions. Here's what to expect at each type.

tabs.name: High Growth Startups
tabs.description: Build analytics from scratch, wear many hats

interviewPrep.title: Interview Preparation
interviewPrep.description: Data interviews focus on SQL, system design, and real-world problem solving
interviewPrep.overallStrategy: Master SQL deeply, understand data pipeline design, and show how you've used data to drive decisions. This is about practical impact, not just algorithms.

prepTips: Be ready to discuss your data projects
Explain a complex analysis or pipeline you've built
Show understanding of data fundamentals
Ask about their data stack and team
Practice SQL interview questions daily
Solve complex joins, aggregations, window functions
Write Python code for data manipulation
Explain query optimization approaches
Think about edge cases and data quality
commonTopics: Complex SQL queries (JOINs, GROUP BY, CTEs)

interviewRounds.focus: Design data pipelines, warehouses, or analytics systems
prepTips: Clarify requirements and scale upfront
Design end-to-end data flow
Discuss technology choices and trade-offs
Consider data quality, latency, and cost
Show awareness of real-world constraints
commonTopics: Choosing between batch and real-time processing

interviewRounds.focus: ML model training or analytics insights
prepTips: Be ready to discuss a complete ML/analytics project
Explain feature engineering and model selection
Show how you validated and evaluated results
Discuss real business impact and metrics
Think about scaling and productionizing solutions
Prepare stories showing data-driven decisions
Have examples of cross-team collaboration
Show how you communicated insights to non-technical stakeholders
Discuss how you've impacted business metrics
Be authentic about your learning journey
commonTopics: A project where data insights drove decisions
How you've worked with business and engineering teams

successFactors: Deep understanding of data structures and algorithms
Ability to think about data quality and testing
Evidence of business impact from data work

recommendedProjects.title: Build Real-World Projects
recommendedProjects.description: Projects demonstrating data engineering and analytics capabilities

projects.name: SQL Practice on Kaggle
projects.description: Solve real SQL problems on Kaggle datasets
projects.whyValuable: Builds SQL foundations with real-world data

projects.name: Exploratory Data Analysis Project
projects.description: Deep dive into a dataset, find insights, visualize findings
projects.whyValuable: Shows ability to explore data and communicate insights

projects.name: Data Visualization Dashboard
projects.description: Create an interactive dashboard from a dataset
projects.whyValuable: Demonstrates ability to make data accessible and actionable

projectTiers.description: Build data infrastructure and ML models

projects.name: ETL Pipeline Project
projects.description: Build a data pipeline that extracts, transforms, and loads data
projects.whyValuable: Core data engineering skill, shows production-level thinking

projects.name: Data Warehouse Project
projects.description: Design and build a data warehouse for analytics
projects.whyValuable: Shows understanding of data modeling and warehouse design

projects.name: Machine Learning Pipeline
projects.description: Build a complete ML system: data prep, training, evaluation
projects.whyValuable: Demonstrates ML fundamentals and data engineering for ML

projectTiers.description: Production-scale data systems and advanced ML

projects.name: Distributed Data Processing Pipeline
projects.description: Build a pipeline using Spark or Flink for large-scale data
projects.whyValuable: Shows ability to handle massive data at scale

projects.name: Real-Time Analytics System
projects.description: Build a system for real-time data ingestion and analysis
projects.whyValuable: Advanced data engineering: streaming and real-time processing

projects.name: Production ML System with MLOps
projects.description: Deploy an ML model at scale with monitoring and retraining
projects.whyValuable: Shows complete understanding of ML in production

successIndicators.title: How to Know You're Ready
successIndicators.description: Key milestones before applying to your target role

indicators.indicator: Can discuss ML basics and practical applications

skillMap.title: Your Skill Map
skillMap.description: Compare your skills against the average Data Engineer

radarAxes.label: DSA
radarAxes.title: Data Structures & Algorithms
radarAxes.description: Your proficiency in solving problems using efficient algorithms and data structures. Important for optimizing data processing and interviews.

radarAxes.label: Data Pipelines
radarAxes.title: Data Pipeline Design
radarAxes.description: Your ability to design and implement scalable data pipelines, ETL processes, and data workflows. Critical for moving data efficiently at scale.

radarAxes.label: Projects
radarAxes.title: Project Experience
radarAxes.description: Your hands-on experience building real-world data projects. Demonstrates practical knowledge of data engineering and analytics.

radarAxes.label: Languages
radarAxes.title: Data Languages
radarAxes.description: Your proficiency in Python, SQL, Spark, and other data-specific languages. The foundation of data engineering work.

radarAxes.label: Data Warehousing
radarAxes.title: Data Warehousing & Analytics
radarAxes.description: Your knowledge of data warehouses, analytics databases, data modeling, and OLAP systems. Essential for managing large-scale data storage.

tech.label: DSA
tech.title: Data Structures & Algorithms
tech.description: Your proficiency in solving problems using efficient data structures and algorithmic thinking. Important for data processing and optimization.

tech.label: Data Pipeline Design
tech.title: Data Pipeline Design
tech.description: Your ability to design and build scalable data pipelines, ETL workflows, and data architecture. Critical for production data systems.

tech.label: Projects
tech.title: Project Experience
tech.description: Your hands-on experience building real-world data science and analytics projects. Demonstrates practical knowledge of data work.

tech.label: Languages
tech.title: Data Languages
tech.description: Your proficiency in Python, SQL, R, and other data science languages. The foundation for data science work.

tech.label: Machine Learning
tech.title: Machine Learning & Statistics
tech.description: Your knowledge of ML algorithms, statistical methods, and model building. Essential for advanced data science roles.

nonTech.label: DSA
nonTech.title: Data Structures & Algorithms
nonTech.description: Your foundational coding ability for data processing and analysis.

nonTech.label: Fundamentals
nonTech.title: Data Fundamentals
nonTech.description: Your grasp of core data concepts like data analysis, statistics, and databases. Foundation for career growth.

nonTech.label: Projects
nonTech.title: Project Experience
nonTech.description: Real-world data projects you've built. Shows practical application of data concepts and analysis skills.

nonTech.label: Languages
nonTech.title: Data Languages
nonTech.description: Your proficiency in Python, SQL, and other languages for data work.

nonTech.label: Machine Learning
nonTech.title: Machine Learning & Statistics
nonTech.description: Your knowledge of basic ML concepts and statistical methods.
